body:
Sometimes I would like to give some of the analysis mesh some transparency (I know it is possible with some of the outputs but not all). I have not found a good way of doing it yet. Anyone that have some good tips on doing that?

Thanks,

daniel
topic: How to give a analysis mesh transparency?

replies.body: As far as I know you can't give transparency to mesh faces. David has a post on why but I can't find it now. The easiest solution that I know is to re-generate the faces as surfaces and color them. With the new re-colorMesh component it should be pretty easy. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/aNZ9EZ3f4*y0rQ5Nbte-Fa3wet26l536MOXLF5DVFdqcG8qKI*US5MJ-oNcNswIxem9tS-edub8FjzRhh0nrGAjNygYE8tb0/transparentMesh.png)
